articles.title: Covid-19: Gauteng records almost 550 new infections, as cases in SA rise to 2 929 862 - News24
articles.description: Gauteng has recorded almost 550 new Covid-19 infections in a 24-hour period – nearly 80% of all new cases in South Africa.
articles.content:
• South Africa recorded 687 new Covid-19 cases on Wednesday.
  • Gauteng accounted for 79% of the new cases.
  • Two new deaths were recorded, bringing the death toll to 89 574.
